91 class Octant{

103 
104

108 
109  static const TreeConstants::Instances sm_treeConstants;
111  // =================================================================================== //
112  // MEMBERS
113  // =================================================================================== //
114  enum OctantInfo {
115  INFO_BOUNDFACE0 = 0,
116  INFO_BOUNDFACE1 = 1,
117  INFO_BOUNDFACE2 = 2,
118  INFO_BOUNDFACE3 = 3,
119  INFO_BOUNDFACE4 = 4,
120  INFO_BOUNDFACE5 = 5,
121  INFO_PBOUNDFACE0 = 6,
122  INFO_PBOUNDFACE1 = 7,
123  INFO_PBOUNDFACE2 = 8,
124  INFO_PBOUNDFACE3 = 9,
125  INFO_PBOUNDFACE4 = 10,
126  INFO_PBOUNDFACE5 = 11,
127  INFO_NEW4REFINEMENT = 12,
128  INFO_NEW4COARSENING = 13,
129  INFO_BALANCED = 14,
130  INFO_AUX = 15,
132  INFO_ITEM_COUNT = 16
133  };
134 
135 private:
136  uint32_t m_x;
137  uint32_t m_y;
138  uint32_t m_z;
139  uint8_t m_level;
140  int8_t m_marker;
141  std::bitset<INFO_ITEM_COUNT> m_info;
146  uint8_t m_dim;
147  int m_ghost;
154  //TODO add bitset for edge & node
155

164  Octant(bool bound, uint8_t dim, uint8_t level, int32_t x, int32_t y, int32_t z = 0);
165  bool operator ==(const Octant & oct2);

250  void computeEdgeVirtualMortons(uint8_t iedge, uint8_t maxdepth, uint8_t balance_codim, const uint8_t (&edgeface)[12][2], uint32_t *nMortons, std::vector<uint64_t> *mortons) const;
251  void computeNodeMinSizeMorton(uint8_t inode, uint8_t maxdepth, const uint8_t (&nodeface)[8][3], bool *hasMorton, uint64_t *morton) const;
252  void computeNodeVirtualMorton(uint8_t inode, uint8_t maxdepth, const uint8_t (&nodeface)[8][3], bool *hasMorton, uint64_t *morton) const;
253  uint64_t computePeriodicMorton(uint8_t iface) const;
254  Octant computePeriodicOctant(uint8_t iface) const;
255  Octant computeNodePeriodicOctant(uint8_t inode) const;
256  Octant computeEdgePeriodicOctant(uint8_t iedge) const;
257  std::array<int64_t,3> getPeriodicCoord(uint8_t iface) const;
258  std::array<int64_t,3> getNodePeriodicCoord(uint8_t inode) const;
259  std::array<int64_t,3> getEdgePeriodicCoord(uint8_t iedge) const;
260  uint8_t getFamilySplittingNode() const;
261 };
